task.title: How to Add Custom Emoticons to Server
task.shortdesc: Here you will learn how to add your own emoticons to a Discord Server.

prereq.p: To add emojis, you need to be a server owner, or to have manage emoji permissions.
You also need to have a prepared emoticon.

context.p: Every server has a library of emojis and you can customize it by adding your own emoticons. If you are the server owner, you have this option by default, but if you are not - you can ask the owner to give you permission to manage emoticons.

step.cmd: Click on the server name in the top left of the application.
Click on the button Upload Emoji.
Select the emoji you want to add and click Open.

result.p: If you have followed the steps correctly, your Emoji tab will look like this:
Your emoji is now added to the Server. You can find it by clicking on the emoji tab(5) under your server's name(6).
